nodes.text: Building 49-A was a cantina that was located on the planet Almas.
Building 49-A was the only cantina on Almas. It was a two-story pre-fabricated unit that was located north of the planet's spaceport. Many of its patrons were farmers, such as the Trandoshan Kressis.

In circa 31 BBY, the Believers Sith cult began poisoning kaluthin plants on Almas, threatening the livelihoods of Almas' farmers. Around this time, the Jedi Lo Pelkar and Rulo visited the cantina, resulting in a tense stand-off, because the farmers incorrectly believed that the Jedi were responsible for the death their crops.
